text: Fortune Barisal (formerly Barisal Burners and Barisal Bulls) is a professional franchise cricket team that plays in the Bangladesh Premier League (BPL). They were formed in 2012, and represent Barisal Division. The team play their home matches at the Barisal Divisional Stadium. ==References== Category:Bangladesh Premier League teams Category:2012 establishments in Bangladesh
title: Fortune Barisal
